title: AIMM (Artificial Intelligence Mind-Mapping) v2.0.0 â€” Cognitive Instruments Framework
description: AIMM 2.0.0 transforms the QSOL cognitive-markup engine into a full-fledged reasoning language. It introduces modular semantic kernels, real-time graph compilation, AI prompt orchestration, and cross-project integrations with UFF, Spectral Algebraics, and QEC. This release formalizes AIMM as the connective framework for symbolic reasoning and multimodal creativity across the QSOL stack.
